keyword: how many calories in a meatball
title: How Many Calories in a Meatball?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a meatball, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per serving, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Meatball?
assumptions: Standard beef meatball (~28 g), baked with breadcrumbs and seasonings, no sauce or added oil.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by meat type, size, recipe, cooking method, and brand. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One standard beef meatball has about 70 kcal and 6 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use ground turkey instead of beef

faqs.q: How many calories in a meatball?
faqs.a: About 70 kcal for one standard baked beef meatball.

faqs.q: What is the protein in a meatball?

faqs.a: Moderate; ~4.5 g total fat, with 1.8 g saturated per meatball.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in a meatball?
faqs.a: Baked is lower; frying adds ~25 kcal due to absorbed oil.
~2.5 g carbs per meatball, mainly from breadcrumbs.
